reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Surcharge - 031615P2081 INL Tactical Pocket Flashl. HD Recorder/Monitor for Cambodian PO. Regional skills Devel(DHS/HSI): Large Delegation L. Regional skills Devel (IN13THP2): Meeting package. Office Equipment: TV/Water Dispenser/Ceiling AC fo. Regional skills Devel (IN13THP2): Venue/Air port t. Office Equipment: Computer/Printer for Cambodian P. Regional skills Devel (IN13THP2): Conference fee f

description.narrative: This award strives to help nations effectively establish the conditions and capacity for achieving peace, security, and stability. More specifically, this includes Surcharge - 031615P2081 INL Tactical Pocket Flashlight for DOD Navsciat [Covers the cost of transporting U.S. Government property (does not include transportation of U.S. Government vehicles or unaccompanied pouches or information technology equipment or supplies. Includes parcel post when separately identified.]. HD Recorder/Monitor for Cambodian PO [Covers the purchase of minicomputers, microcomputers, personal computers, printers, and related systems equipment (e.g., small electronics devices including IPads, e-readers, etc.) (Effective as of 10/01/2015).]. Regional skills Devel(DHS/HSI): Large Delegation Land transportation - Government credit card reimbursement from Malaysia for HSI Human Trafficking/Human Smuggling Study Visit to USA on Sep 2-16, 2018. Regional skills Devel (IN13THP2): Meeting package and lodging for Regional Women in Law Enforcement Conference (Manila) Nov 18-22, 2019. Office Equipment: TV/Water Dispenser/Ceiling AC for Cambodian PO [Covers all other equipment not otherwise classified. May include movable appliances such as window-type air conditioners, water coolers, portable heaters, etc.]. Regional skills Devel (IN13THP2): Venue/Air port transfer/Private internet/Backdrop/Interpreter/Translation Booth/Handout/Certificate printing and Online registration for Crimes Against Children (Investigation & Cybersecurity), Siem Reap, Cambodia, Oct 19. Regional skills Devel(DHS/HSI): Large Delegation Land transportation - Government credit card reimbursement from Cambodia for HSI Human Trafficking/Human Smuggling Study Visit to USA on Sep 2-16, 2018. Office Equipment: Computer/Printer for Cambodian PO [Covers the purchase of minicomputers, microcomputers, personal computers, printers, and related systems equipment (e.g., small electronics devices including IPads, e-readers, etc.) (Effective as of 10/01/2015).]. Regional skills Devel (IN13THP2): Conference fee for 9 travelers from Cambodia to attend Dallas Crime Against Children Conference at Dallas, Texas on Aug 8-15, 2020.

To help nations effectively establish the conditions and capacity for achieving peace, security, and stability; and for responding effectively against arising threats to national or international security and stability.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

participating-org.usg:office-name: Bureau of International Narcotics and Law Enforcement Affairs

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: The United States is engaging Thailand primarily as a development partner to leverage its significant resources as an upper middle income country to encourage it to take a greater leadership role in addressing global and regional challenges of mutual concern. Throughout its modern history as a constitutional monarchy, Thailand has experienced years of political uncertainty, including, most recently, a military coup in May 2014 following six months of protests, the dissolution of parliament, and failed national elections. Such dramatic shifts in the political system are disruptive for a key U.S. ally and make clear that there is a continued need for engagement in priority areas with U.S. support for good governance and transnational rule of law. Many political, legal, and criminal justice institutions are still developing and will benefit from continued U.S. engagement. Achieving U.S. strategic goals in Thailand and in the region is predicated on the country's stability. U.S. assistance will promote peace and security, foster reforms and modernization of the criminal justice system, and strengthen good governance.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Peace and Security - General
